name: Fortune's arrow
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Fortunes Arrow/Fortunes arrow

sections.body: can always be recovered if searched for. Even if lost, it finds its way back to its previous owner within 1d6 days as long as she still lives. Fortune's arrow fails to return to its owner only if she dies or freely gives it to another.
